title: Saxophonist Tony Malaby's New Quartet Brings Out His Rowdy Side
teaser: Malaby has merged his two trios — with a cello and a tuba — into a quartet called Tubacello. Their new album is Scorpion Eater. Jazz critic Kevin Whitehead says he hopes to hear from them again.
